node.excerpt: These can be only sort-of weekly, right? Moving This week & weekend I moved home. Sort-of. I now live in Putney.  It's rather sunny here…
I am writing weeknotes once more. Gosh it's been a little while. There is much we must discuss, dear reader!  But all in good time. Please…

frontmatter.title: How GraphQL can help migrations and extraction projects

node.excerpt: There's a tonne of buzz around graphQL right now and it seems like virtually every platform is getting some kind of support for it…
